course_headers.header_text: HRM 402: Also offered by BYU Independent Study; enroll anytime throughout year; one year to complete; additional tuition required; register at is.byu.edu.

The non-enveloped sections of HRM 402 are NOT for admitted HR majors or students intending to apply to the HRM program; HRM students are required to take HRM 402 in an envelope during their Winter Jr. Core.  Contingent on seats, students planning to complete majors outside HR may request an add-code by visiting 460 TNRB, emailing msb_advisement@byu.edu, or from the instructor on the first day of class.
